name: Rogue Marine
description:
Clear the sector, make a run for the exit, chase the missions or search for awesome weapons and upgrades as you battle to clear the ship of alien invaders, rogue troopers and deadly bots... but remember to keep your suit powered up or its game over!

How long can you survive?

Headphones recommended for best game experience.

FEATURES

• Solitaire-style game play
• Easy to learn, hard to master
• Quick game sessions
• Atmospheric sound design
• Over 30 missions to chase
• Game progress saved
• Heaps of weapons and upgrades
